channel.title: Histogram on Mike Sheneman's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Histogram on Mike Sheneman's Blog

item.title: Histogram
item.description: Hello all! Letâ€™s make a histogram to look at the weights of MLB players through the Master table in the Lahman database. First, install the following packages in R-Studio. library(Lahman) library(sqldf) library(ggplot2) After the packages are installed, it is time to extract the data with an sql request. query<-"SELECT weight FROM Master" result<-sqldf(query) After the data is extracted, it is time to visualize the data. ggplot()+ geom_histogram(data=result,aes(x=weight),color="blue",fill="yellow",bins=50)+ ggtitle("Body-Weight Distribution for Baseball Players") There you have it, a nice polished histogram!
